channel.title: @@@@Linux Debian run.sh Problem ! Help NEEDED@@@ someone please help!
channel.description:
[b][size=18pt]Linux Debian run.sh Problem !![/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/fwu5jl.jpg[/img]
Compiler.sh : #! /bin/sh
exec javac -classpath "deps/*" -d `dirname $0`/bin $(find `dirname $0`/src/server -type f | grep \.java$ ) -nowarn
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/iwn1pj.jpg[/img]
Run.sh Edit : #! /bin/sh exec java -classpath bin:"deps/*" server.GUI
can someone help me ? i can give putty and filezilla stuff, if needed add me in skype : Aivo o.O ( A1v0@live.com )

item.title: @@@@Linux Debian run.sh Problem ! Help NEEDED@@@ someone please help!

tell me what i must do

item.title: @@@@Linux Debian run.sh Problem ! Help NEEDED@@@ someone please help!

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You are trying to run a GUI on a server that has no display. You’ll want to remove that bit of the code

Compiler.sh : #! /bin/sh

exec javac -classpath “deps/*” -d dirname $0/bin $(find dirname $0/src/server -type f | grep .java$ ) -nowarn

Run.sh Edit : #! /bin/sh
